reviewText: Professor Louie may not be a fantastic teacher per se, he has a lot of information to share and it is well worth going back again and again and picking up new tricks every time you do.  I loved it!

not bad, but not what I expected. As a beginner I was looking for more step one, step two, and I got the impression from the dvd that this was a primer to help you transfer from some other instrument to the accordion.
